changeSet.author: bogdan
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO dictionaries (native_language_id, learn_language_id, dictionary_name) VALUES ((select language_id from languages where language_name = 'Ukraine'), (select language_id from languages where language_name = 'English'), 'My English'), ((select language_id from languages where language_name = 'Ukraine'), (select language_id from languages where language_name = 'English'), 'Turbo English'), ((select language_id from languages where language_name = 'Ukraine'), (select language_id from languages where language_name = 'German'), 'For my little FÃ¼hrer'), ((select language_id from languages where language_name = 'Ukraine'), (select language_id from languages where language_name = 'Polish'), 'Ooo kurwa'), ((select language_id from languages where language_name = 'Ukraine'), (select language_id from languages where language_name = 'English'), 'Hello'), ((select language_id from languages where language_name = 'Ukraine'), (select language_id from languages where language_name = 'Italian'), 'Bellissimo spaghetti');
